name: pon-smarteEinkaufsliste
0:
”Alexa open pon shopping list and add 2 bottles of milk”
”Alexa open pon shopping list”
”Alexa open pon shopping list and add 3 cans of green beans to my list”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pon shopping list
Developer Terms of Use
des:
pon is the smart shopping list app that makes everyday shopping convenient and easy. With the Alexa skill you can add items to your pon shopping list with your voice. Get the free App for iPhone from the AppStore and log in with your pon user account.

pon remembers all the products and product features you have bought, so you don't have to enter them again and again. pon also remembers the quantity you usually buy of a product and takes it over automatically when you add items to your list. This makes shopping a breeze. 

Share your shopping list with friends, colleagues or family and keep track of all your purchases at a glance.

Automatic synchronisation ensures that your lists are always up to date and available on all your devices.

Send us your feedback to feedback@ponlist.de

Have fun shopping with pon
